divs: Sighting DetailsFor the past 3 weeks I have had something killing my barbado sheep. The sex origins have been removed. This morning I found one bardado sheep dead with it origins removed and buzzards had started to stripe it and other one missing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Port Lavaca
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: This moringi I went out to check on my Barbado Sheep and found one dead and one missing.
